oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Snow Benefit at the Grand Ole Opry - Year 5 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Hank Snow Benefit Concert at the Grand Ole Opry. The segment is hosted by T. Tommy Cutrer (musician) and features performances by: Merle Kilgore (musician), the Bama Band (musical group), and Hank Williams Jr. (musician). The recording is from an unidentified date. The tape is identified as the fifth year of the program. The tape is part two of three.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: The Bama Band; Hank Williams Jr.; Merle Kilgore
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:06) T. Tommy Cutrer reflects on what causes a delay I shows -- (00:49) The Wabash Cannonball (The Bama Band) -- (03:22) Hank Williams Junior [featuring T. Tommy Cutrer and Merle Kilgore voiceover] (Merle Kilgore) -- (05:15) Honky Tonkin' (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (07:12) Dixie on My Mind (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (09:56) La Grange (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (15:47) Old Habits (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (19:36) The South's Gonna Rattle Again (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (22:47) Leave Them Boys Alone (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (26:10) The Pressure is on (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (30:06) Blueberry Hill (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (30:56) Whole Lot of Shakin' Going on (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (33:33) Your Cheatin' Heart (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (36:05) Hi-Heel Sneakers (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (41:08) Midnight Rider (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (42:30) Dinosaur (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (43:13) The Coalition to Ban Coalitions (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (44:58) The American Dream (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (47:08) If Heaven Ain't Alot Like Dixie (Hank Williams Jr.) -- (49:05) Blues Man [incomplete] (Hank Williams Jr.)
